payload.title: Fix: Dashboard TUI fails with dynamic require of child_process
payload.description: The CLI dashboard command was failing in production with 'Dynamic require of child_process is not supported'. Root cause: clipboardy package uses child_process but wasn't marked as --external in esbuild config. Solution: Added --external:child_process and --external:clipboardy to build command in packages/cli/package.json. Results: Build successful (516kbâ†’198kb), all 178 tests passing, dashboard works in production. Severity: HIGH (production users affected). Status: RESOLVED.
